H0.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Silicon Dioxide (SiO2)

H1.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Magnesium Carbonate (MgCO3)

H2.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Aluminum Oxide (Al2O3)

H3.text: Pearl is composed of minute crystals of which compound. Caco3

A4.text: Aragonite is a carbonate mineral and one of the three most common naturally occurring crystal forms of calcium carbonate (CaCO3), the others being calcite and vaterite.
